content: Unfinished is the sixth and final Chapter of Black Myth: Wukong, taking place in Mount Huago. With Zhu Bajie and the Destined One climbing the peak of the mountain, the chapter features an onslaught of bosses. This Walkthrough is divided up by the major regions in this chapter marked by Shrines, and includes guides to help you through each area, and how to defeat the many required and optional bosses you'll find along the way.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_6-Unfinished.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 6 - Unfinished'.
The content is as follows:
Unfinished is the sixth and final Chapter of Black Myth: Wukong, taking place in Mount Huago. With Zhu Bajie and the Destined One climbing the peak of the mountain, the chapter features an onslaught of bosses. This Walkthrough is divided up by the major regions in this chapter marked by Shrines, and includes guides to help you through each area, and how to defeat the many required and optional bosses you'll find along the way.
